data.title: Year 12 Early Offer Guarantee
data.meta_description: How to receive an offer to study at Griffith before you receive your ATAR or IB diploma results.
data.text:
It is unlikely that you will need to submit any further documentation for us to be able to make you an offer. We will be in touch if we need any additional information.

If you are not able to complete your VET studies by the end of the school year, we may ask you to provide a copy of your completion certificate when you receive it. You will have until 31 December 2024 to provide evidence that you have completed your VET qualification.

To receive an early offer, you must list the March 2025 offering of an approved Year 12 Early Offer Guarantee degree as your first QTAC preference. It must be above any later offerings or any degrees that are not approved as part of the Year 12 Early Offer Guarantee scheme.

Let's assume you’re applying for an early offer into the Bachelor of Business. Below are examples of how to—and how not to—order your preferences.

Having the Bachelor of Business MAR 25 offering as your first QTAC preference will ensure you can be made an early offer for Trimester 1 2025.

Preference

Degree

Offering

1

Bachelor of Business

Mar 2025

2

Bachelor of Arts

Mar 2025

3

Bachelor of Business

Jul 2025

If you list a degree that is not part of the Year 12 Early Offer Guarantee scheme, e.g., the Bachelor of Medical Science, or a degree that you are not eligible for above a degree that is approved under the scheme, you won’t receive an early offer.

If you preference like the example below, you would be considered for a place in the Bachelor of Medical Science for Trimester 1 2025 in the QTAC offer round in January after your Year 12 results are released. If you did not receive an offer into the Bachelor of Medical Science, you would be considered for a place in the Bachelor of Business in the January offer round.

Preference

Degree

Offering

1

Bachelor of Medical Science

Mar 2025

2

Bachelor of Business

Mar 2025

3

Bachelor of Arts

Mar 2025

Your MAR 25 preference must also be above any JUL 25 preferences to receive an early offer. If you preference like the example below, you won't receive an early offer. Instead, you will be considered for a place in the Bachelor of Business for Trimester 2 2025 in the QTAC offer rounds in February after your Year 12 results are released.

Preference

Degree

Offering

1

Bachelor of Business

Jul 2025

2

Bachelor of Business

Mar 2025

3

Bachelor of Arts

Mar 2025

If you are receiving an offer under our ATAR/IB Early stream it is most likely that you will receive this offer on 15 November 2025, once you have your QCAA documentation which includes your IA3 results. If you should have this earlier however, we may be able to make you an offer on 6 September or 18 October 2025.

f you are receiving an offer under our VET or Head Start streams and have already applied to QTAC, we may be able to make you an offer as early as the 6 September.
